sentence: Trump-backed Georgia Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker raised almost $5.4 million in the past three months and has about the same amount in the bank.
title: candidates are getting 'crushed' in early fundraising: report

sentence: CNN: For years, Herschel Walker has told the same inspiring story: that he graduated in the top 1% of his class at the University of Georgia.
title: candidate Walker claimed he graduated in the top 1% of his college class. He didn't
